QuestData.Title: Raw Materials
QuestData.Description: Thank you, $c. We owe you our lives.$b$bBut if we're ever to see the surface again, we'll have to fight our way out of here. That means I'm going to need to craft some weapons and armor.$b$bBefore you found me, I saw a soldier eaten by one of those orca up there.$b$bI'll wager that if you cut a few of them open, you'll find plenty of scrap metal for me to work with.$b$bIf you don't want to swim up to them, I bet you could lure one down to you with some entrails...
QuestData.LogDescription: Samir wants you to collect 3 Rent Scrap Metal from Frenzied Orca in the Kelp Forest.$b$bYou can lure an orca using Pincer Entrails from Clacksnap Pincers.
